name: Lost Roman Empire
description: This WAD was orginaly made for practicing stair- building. Then we desided to make a roman styled level, because Asterix told us to?? Next to our friend Asterix stod Obelix and inspired us to the monster part. Panoramix was incrideble to light up the ...Light! At skill four you need more than one finger on the firebutton. Assurancetourix helped us out with the music part... hope you "like" it.
